TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {3821=In 1997, Volvo introduced their all-new and first ever all wheel drive system for use in the 1998 Volvo V70 XC and V70R. This all wheel drive system also introduced an new fully independent rear suspension system for Volvo. To display these innovations at the 1997 North American International Auto Show, Volvo Cars commissioned the development of this completely custom display consisting of a fully detailed rear subframe mounted to a custom steel table. The only one in the world, it now resides in our showroom. More detailed pics are available in our showroom tour section!}
